CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Tests that evaluating 'throw undefined|1|string|object|Error' in the console won't crash the browser and correctly reported. Bug 59611.


Running: testThrowUndefined
throw undefined
VM:1 Uncaught undefined
(anonymous) @ VM:1

Running: testThrowNumber
throw 1
VM:1 Uncaught 1
(anonymous) @ VM:1

Running: testThrowString
throw 'asdf'
VM:1 Uncaught asdf
(anonymous) @ VM:1

Running: testThrowObject
throw {a:42}
VM:1 Uncaught {a: 42}
(anonymous) @ VM:1

Running: testThrowError
throw new Error('asdf')
VM:1 Uncaught Error: asdf
(anonymous) @ VM:1
